# cancR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The cancR package aids in data management and analysis of mainly time-to-event data in registry-based projects. The package is internally used by the Research Group at the Department of Plastic Surgery, Rigshospitalet, Copenhagen, Denmark. 

All types of use of the cancR package should be discussed with the package developer and we take no responsibility for the use of the cancR package without our permission or knowledge.
